oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-05-10 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 10, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Jim Reeves (host/performer), guest performer George Jones, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, the Jordanaires, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 970th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Reeves; Rod Brasfield; George Jones; Tommy Jackson; Jordanaires; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Jim Reeves -- Everywhere You Go (Jim Reeves) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces George Jones -- Eskimo Pie (George Jones) -- Prince Albert commercial (Rod Brasfield, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces Tommy Jackson -- Katy Hill (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Jim Reeves talks -- Peace In The Valley (Jim Reeves, Jordanaires) Jim Reeves and Grant Turner introduce Chet Atkins -- The Bells Of St. Mary's (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Reeves, Jim; Jones, George, 1931-2013
